Articles.Content:
Hello all, I know one feature of this new release is now you have to bring kerbals home the old fashioned way rather then just hitting 'end flight' button.

But I just crashed an experimental lander into the water, and the capsule with the kerbals survived. They landed intact, and are just floating in the middle of the ocean. I want to bring them back to the ksc, and use them again, but there is no longer a 'end flight' button. Is there another way of getting them to a different flight?
You should be able to go to the tracking station, select the flight in question, and select "Recover" and it will bring your Kerbals back. You can also "terminate" but this will kill the Kerbals.
